actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that an advance refunding bond will not be a tax-exempt bond if it results in amounts becoming available which are invested in substantially guaranteed higher yielding investments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that an advance refunding bond will not be tax-exempt if it results in amounts becoming available which are invested in substantially guaranteed higher yielding investments.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that an advance refunding bond will not be a tax-exempt bond if it results in amounts becoming available which are invested in substantially guaranteed higher yielding investments.
